# Appendix A: Checklists {#sec-appendix-checklists .unnumbered}

This appendix contains printable checklists for all major tasks. Print these and keep them at the relevant workstation.

---

## Checklist 1: Server Transportation — Pre-Transport {.unnumbered}

**Server ID:** ________________ **Date:** ________________ **Maker:** ________________ **Checker:** ________________

| # | Item | Done? |
|---|------|-------|
| 1 | Server serial number recorded | ☐ |
| 2 | Photos taken (6 angles) | ☐ |
| 3 | Server weight recorded | ☐ |
| 4 | Anti-static bag applied | ☐ |
| 5 | Foam padding (2" minimum all sides) | ☐ |
| 6 | Outer box/crate secured | ☐ |
| 7 | Fragile labels on all sides + top | ☐ |
| 8 | "This Side Up" labels applied | ☐ |
| 9 | Shock indicator attached | ☐ |
| 10 | Moisture indicator placed inside | ☐ |
| 11 | For assembled: internal components checked | ☐ |
| 12 | For assembled: component list taped inside lid | ☐ |
| 13 | Vehicle clean, dry, with proper suspension | ☐ |
| 14 | Tie-down straps available | ☐ |
| 15 | Transportation ticket created | ☐ |

**Maker Signature:** ________________ **Checker Signature:** ________________

::: {.callout-tip}
## Printing Tip
Print these checklists on **heavy paper** or **laminate** them for reuse with dry-erase markers. Keep a stack of fresh copies at each workstation.
:::
